org.fujion.codemirror

Class CodeMirrorXML.Tag

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.codemirror.CodeMirrorXML.Tag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOptionMapTransform, IClientTransform
    Enclosing class:
    CodeMirrorXML

    public static class CodeMirrorXML.Tag
extends Options
    Represents a single XML tag with its attributes and children.
